title: My dear wife just arrived Beijing
author: Chen Liangliang

summary.text: we tooke subway back to my home, well, if it can be called "home". My little girl kissed me and it felt so Awesome

content: we tooke subway back to my home, well, if it can be called "home". My little girl kissed me and it felt so Awesome

title: 2014, you and the sun still with me
author: Liu xiaofei

summary.text: 2014 just arrived~! My man and i waked up late to enjoy the warm bed. He got up early than me and cooked me a usual breakfast, but i feel like being like this forever~

content: 2014 just arrived~! My man and i waked up late to enjoy the warm bed. He got up early than me and cooked me a usual breakfast, but i feel like being like this forever~
